trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Woodstock
There were no other sightings in Woodstock on or around September 15th 2004
divs: Sighting Detailsme, my (now ex)wife and stepson were eating at IHOP on Hwy 92 near 5-75 in Woodstock, GA. When we finished, the three of us started walking out to the car. My stepson noticed something overhead and asked me if I knew what it was. Both me and my then wife looked up and saw a black triangle with three lights (one on each corner) moving silently through some clouds approximately 250-300 feet above us. It was moving rather slowly, and it didn't make any noise. I initially believed it to be some sort of drone, or experimental craft since we live so close to Dobbins AFB. I assumed it was monitoring traffic, and decided not to pay any more attention to it and we left. I remember it moving almost too slow for it to stay aloft. If a plane was moving that slow it would have crashed. I thought it may have been an electrical powered glider of some sort. My wife was insistent that what we had seen was a UFO. I agreed since I didn't know what it was, and it was something I had never seen before or heard about. I still don't know if what I saw was a man made experimental craft and would appreciate any information regarding it.
